name: getTickCount
description: Returns the current value of an internal millisecond timer.

examples.title: Simple GettickCount
examples.description: GettickCount function displays the system time in milliseconds

examples.title: Get loading time using getTickCount
examples.description: Here, we have simple example or real time usage about getTickCount. We have a loop that over 10000 times & we are going to calculate the time about the loading time for that loop. So we have added the start time with some tickcount value before and after the loop we have end time. So the subtraction of end & start time is point out the loading time about the loop.
examples.code:
Start time is:#startTime#
End time is:#endTime#
Loading Time is:#endTime-startTime# MilliSeconds
